/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. Cars and pedestrians can be seen going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and textures of the cityscape.
